title: Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite
content:
g menu where the ring can be bought for 175 gold. Choosing option 5 and passing a DC20 Intimidation Charisma Check will result in you gaining the ring and Shadowheart's approval (+1). The same will be achieved by selecting option 4 and passing a DC15 check in either Performance Charisma or Intelligence. Option 5 and passing a D15 Performance Charisma Check results in you gaining the ring. All options end Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite.

How to unlock Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite
